title: Chelsea vs Manchester United result: Player ratings as Marcus Rashford secures Manchester United's passage through to the Carabao Cup quarter-finals
text:
A Marcus Rashford double inspired Manchester United to qualify for the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup after a 2-1 victory against Chelsea at Stanford Bridge.

The 21-year-old England international followed up his strike in United's 3-1 victory at Norwich at the weekend by putting United into the lead from the penalty spot after Marcos Alonso brought down Daniel James.

Michy Batshuayi restored parity with an excellent strike from 22 yards but Rashford added a second with a stunning free-kick to put United back into the lead.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Anthony Martial had a chance to put the game to bed once and for all in the final moments of the tie but United held on to secure safe passage into the last eight.

Here are our player ratings from the round of 16 tie:

The 21-year-old England international followed up his strike in United's 3-1 victory at Norwich at the weekend by putting United into the lead from the penalty spot after Marcos Alonso brought down Daniel James.
